item.title: Re: Forum Update (August 5, 2015)
item.description:
I don't know but the exact same thing happens in Opera. I'll test different browsers.


Edit: Works in Firefox.
Edit: Works in Internet Explorer in Windows 8 Preview in VirtualBox

item.title: Re: Forum Update (August 5, 2015)
item.description:
Quote from: Lamp on Today at 04:57:13 PM
Ok well I switched to safari. That was easy as pie. Just clicked File → Import From → Google Chrome, and that's about it!


Screw Google Chrome. I hate their stupid user switching thing...

item.title: Re: Forum Update (August 5, 2015)
item.description:
Ok well I switched to safari. That was easy as pie. Just clicked File → Import From → Google Chrome, and that's about it!


Screw Google Chrome. I hate their stupid user switching thing in the upper right corner and how you can't disable it anymore. ...
